channel.title: Two, Simple Questions
channel.description:
Ok first before i get a post "if its simple how come you cant do it" well i know its just one of those things you dont know, but its easy..idk hard 2 xplain but.
1.. When i open a Clientside .class file like class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 in notepad ++ how do i get the language to go not all..gay lol
2..Uh if my client that i downloaded doesnt have a client.java or a client txt file..how do i do edits to things like when you run it, how would i change the application name.

item.title: Two, Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @joeyjuggalo joeyjuggalo
item.description:
@joeyjuggalo wrote:

Umm…there is only .txt files for a few of the classes like…class8.java

Read full topic

item.title: Two, Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @pker4lifeXD pker4lifeXD
item.description:
@pker4lifeXD wrote:

ugh dude this is what u do to edit… ps: cavaj blows.

ok first u dont wanna edit .class files. u should edit the .java ones. but anways if for some reason u want to… use JAD it is the best java decompiler out. search it on google

Read full topic

item.title: Two, Simple Questions

item.description:

get a java decompiler a good one is named Cavaj
